stimulusHtml: An object undergoes simple harmonic motion. The graph shows the acceleration of the object as a function of time, and at time t0 the acceleration is in the positive direction as indicated. Which of the following describes the object’s displacement and velocity at time t0 ?
choicesHtml: The object’s displacement from equilibrium and its velocity are both in the positive direction.
The object’s displacement from equilibrium and its velocity are both in the negative direction.
The object’s displacement from equilibrium is in the positive direction, and its velocity is in the negative direction.
The object’s displacement from equilibrium is in the negative direction, and its velocity is in the positive direction.
